sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些程度副词都有"相当，颇"之意。
means: fairly ： 语意最弱，多用于褒义，表示适度地、尚可的意思。不可与too或比较级连用。
pretty ： 用法与rather相似。常用于非正式文体。
quite含义比fairly稍强，与不定冠词连用时，一般放在不定冠词之前。
rather语气比quite强，褒意贬意无可使用。可与too和比较级连用。

Sentence.sentence: Only if the jobless arrive at the job centre with a CV, register for online job search, and start looking for work will they be eligible for benefit—and then they should report weekly rather than fortnightly.

Sentence.sentence: Rather than concluding that children make parents either happy or miserable, Senior suggests we need to redefine happiness: instead of thinking of it as something that can be measured by moment-to-moment joy, we should consider being happy as a past-tense
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Rather than have people simply rate their beauty compared with others, he asked them to identify an original photograph of themselves from a lineup including versions that had been altered to appear more and less attractive.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Rather than portraying landscape, land artists used the physical substance of the land itself as their medium.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Rather than pulling students back, a gap year pushes them ahead by preparing them for independence, new responsibilities and environmental changes—all things that first-year students often struggle with the most.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Rather than obsessing over the scale, turn your focus to how you look, feel how your clothes fit and your overall energy level.

Sentence.sentence: So then the problem is not really about technology, but rather, "how do we innovate our institutions and our work practices?"
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: That might seem rather an obscure point, but it sets the tone for an exhibition that contains a lot of black-and-white photographs and relatively few natural objects.

Sentence.sentence: The Federal Circuit issued an unusual order stating that the case would be heard by all 12 of the courts judges, rather than a typical panel of three, and that one issue it wants to evaluate is whether it should "reconsider" its State Street Bank ruling.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The jury is also said to be the best surviving example of direct rather than representative democracy.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The lesson is not that you should make your personal life an open book, but rather, when given the option to offer up details about yourself or painstakingly conceal them, you should just be honest.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The Romantics commemorated the leading painters and authors of their day, stressing the uniqueness of the artist's personal experience rather than public glory.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Their analysis ruled out the possibility that it was firms' political influence, rather than their CSR stand, that accounted for the leniency: Companies that contributed more to political campaigns did not receive lower fines.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: They found that the principal requirement for what is called global cascades 一 the widespread propagation of influence through networks 一 is the presence not of a few influentials but, rather, of a critical mass of easily influenced people.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: This has created "a paradox" in that recruiting first-generation students, but then watching many of them fail, means that higher education has "continued to reproduce and widen, rather than close" an achievement gap based on social class, according to th
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Those forced to exercise their smiling muscles reacted more enthusiastically to funny cartons than did those whose mouths were contracted in a frown, suggesting that expressions may influence emotions rather than just the other way around.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: time, rather than intention, has given them legitimacy.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Today's farm laborers, while still predominantly born in Mexico, are more likely to be settled rather than migrating and more likely to be married than single.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: While the conversation around our environment and our responsibility toward it remains centered on shopping hags and straws, we're ignoring the balance of power that implies that as "consumers" we must shop sustainably, rather than as "citizens" hole our
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Yet rather than empowering teachers to find what works best for their students, the policy imposes a flat, across-the-board rule.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 在一定程度上; 颇，相当

sentences.en: This book is rather too easy for this boy.
sentences.cn: 这本书对于这个孩子来说太简单。

sentences.en: I reckon that he is rather too old to marry again.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的年龄太大, 不太适于再婚。

means.word_mean: 或多或少; 有几分; 相当

sentences.en: This restaurant is rather more expensive than that one.
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅的收费比那家贵得多。

means.word_mean: （与动词连用以减弱语气）有点儿，稍微
（纠正所说的话或提供更确切的信息）更确切地讲，更准确地说
（提出不同或相反的观点）相反，反而，而是 </seg>

data.mean: （常用于表示轻微的批评、失望或惊讶）相当，在某种程度上
（提出不同或相反的观点）相反，反而，而是

sentence.cn: 我说：“难道您没发现其中的某些部分相当繁重吗？”
sentence.en: I said, "Don't you find parts of it rather heavy going?" She answered,"Oh, sure, but I just skip over those parts and go on to the next good part."
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

mean.mean: （常用于表示轻微的批评、失望或惊讶）相当，在某种程度上

sentence.cn: 但我将其视为自由领域。
sentence.en: But rather I see it as an area of freedom.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

mean.mean: （提出不同或相反的观点）相反，反而，而是

expand_knowledge_list.en: 2.a rather cold day<->quite a tall man
expand_knowledge_list.cn: 注意句子中冠词的位置

lj.lj_ly: I had rather not see him.

phrase.cizu_name: rather you (或 him, her等) than me

jx.jx_en_mean: used to convey that one would be reluctant oneself to undertake a particular task or project undertaken by someone else
jx.jx_cn_mean: （用以表示自己不愿承担他人的任务或工程）那是你（或他、她）的事

lj.lj_ly: ‘I'm picking him up after lunch. ’‘Rather you than me.’.

entry.def: You use rather than when you are contrasting two things or situations. Rather than introduces the thing or situation that is not true or that you do not want.

example.ex: The problem was psychological rather than physiological...
example.tran: 问题是心理方面的而不是生理方面的。

example.ex: Sedge is similar in appearance to grass but has a solid rather than a hollow stem...
example.tran: 莎草看上去和普通的草没什么两样，但其草茎是实芯的而不是空芯的。

entry.def: You use rather when you are correcting something that you have just said, especially when you are describing a particular situation after saying what it is not.
entry.tran: 而是；更确切地说；还不如说；相反

example.ex: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was not the arid place it is now. Rather, it was warm and damp, populated by dense primordial forest...
example.tran: 2,000万年前，爱达荷州并不像现在这样干旱。相反，那时的爱达荷州温暖潮湿，有大片的原始森林。

example.ex: But there must be no talk of final victory; rather, the long, hard slog to a solution...
example.tran: 但是这还谈不上是最后的胜利；而是长期、艰难地寻找解决方法的过程。

entry.def: If you say that you would rather do something or you'd rather do it, you mean that you would prefer to do it. If you say that you would rather not do something, you mean that you do not want to do it.

example.ex: If it's all the same to you, I'd rather work at home...
example.tran: 如果对你来说没什么差别，我宁愿在家中工作。

example.ex: Which programme would you rather appear on?...
example.tran: 你更愿意在哪个节目中露面？

entry.def: You use rather to indicate that something is true to a fairly great extent, especially when you are talking about something unpleasant or undesirable.

example.ex: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances...
example.tran: 我在非同寻常的环境下长大。

example.ex: It had made some rather bad mistakes which I thought should be corrected...
example.tran: 它犯了一些相当严重的错误，我觉得应该加以纠正。

entry.def: You use rather before verbs that introduce your thoughts and feelings, in order to express your opinion politely, especially when a different opinion has been expressed.

example.ex: I rather think he was telling the truth...
example.tran: 我倒觉得他讲的是真话。

example.ex: I rather like the decorative effect.
example.tran: 我倒很喜欢装饰的效果。

entry.def: People sometimes say rather to express agreement or acceptance.

example.ex: 'Well, he did have a sort of family connection with it, didn't he.' — 'Oh yes. Rather.'
example.tran: “那么，他的确和它有些家族渊源，是不是？”——“噢，是的，的确如此。”

sentences.sentence: "rather than disappoint the children, he did two quick tricks before he left"
"he didn't call; rather (or instead), he wrote her a letter"
"used English terms instead of Latin ones"
"I rather regret that I cannot attend"
"He's rather good at playing the cello"
"clean it well, preferably with warm water"

means.word_mean: 4. to a degree (not used with a negative);

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hrathor 'earlier, sooner', comparative of hræthe without delay, from hræth 'prompt' (see rathe)

sentences.en: She fell and hurt her leg rather badly.

sentences.cn: 我没有考不及格，事实上，我考得不错！
sentences.en: I didn't fail the exam; in fact I did rather well!

sentences.cn: 这是个相当难的问题。
sentences.en: It was a rather difficult question.

sentences.cn: 这真是个难题。
sentences.en: It was rather a difficult question.

sentences.cn: 他看上去很像他的父亲。
sentences.en: He looks rather like his father.

sentences.en: The patient has responded to the treatment rather better than expected.

sentences.en: We were rather hoping you'd be able to do it by Friday.

sentences.en: In the end he had to walk─or rather run─to the office.

sentences.cn: “我明天去爬山。”“你去吧，我可不去！”

sentences.cn: 我有点儿怀疑我们正在犯错误。
sentences.en: I rather suspect we're making a mistake.

sentences.en: He is kind and friendly despite his rather bluff manner.

sentences.en: His remarks were rather out of place.

sentences.cn: 她听到这个建议,有点心慌.
sentences.en: She was rather alarmed at the proposal.

sentences.cn: 这双鞋有点太大了.
sentences.en: These shoes are rather too big.

sentences.cn: 太阳被遮住,天气变得有点冷.
sentences.en: The sun went in and it grew rather cold.

sentences.cn: 她有点害羞.
sentences.en: She is rather bashful.

sentences.cn: 你的衣着显得有点寒酸.
sentences.en: You look rather shabby in those clothes.

sentences.cn: 这事有点碍口, 不好说.

sentences.en: Is this not rather strange?

sentences.en: Rubeus Hagrid : We're bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you'd rather stay, of course.

sentences.en: I used rather to like to fancy her a somewhat quiet and serious, yet fair nymph.

sentences.en: One thing rather quenched the vanities: she had to wear her cousin's clothes.

sentences.en: It has good portion, but it tastes rather bland, and oily.

sentences.cn: 相反, 我们是曲折前行的, 这主要是因为我们的双腿在结构或功能上有点不平衡.
sentences.en: Rather, we meander, mainly due to a slight structural or functional imbalance of our legs.

sentences.cn: 本周末我的确有点特别的事, 确实是非同寻常的事.
sentences.en: I do have something special for this weekend. Something really rather out of the ordinary.

sentences.cn: 他偶尔发出一两声短促的咳嗽,打破这多少有点叫人害怕的静寂.
sentences.en: From time to time his sharp cough broke the rather frightening stillness.

sentences.cn: 每个人似乎都有点不对劲,想发发牢骚.
sentences.en: Everyone seemed rather out of sorts and inclined to croak.

sentences.cn: 这个比方有点驴唇不对马嘴.
sentences.en: The analogy is rather farfetched.

sentences.cn: 她觉得有点委屈.
sentences.en: She feels rather hard done by.

sentences.cn: 那种香水到了第二天就留下一股有点酸臭的气味,就像是馊了的花露水似的.
sentences.en: Rather stale smell that incense leaves next day . Like foul flowerwater.

sentences.cn: 他们富有的舅舅对他们有点小气.
sentences.en: Their rich uncle treated them rather chintzily.

sentences.cn: 有点呈杏仁状, 中等大小, 位置分的比较开, 既不凹陷,也不突出.
sentences.en: Eyes somewhat almond shaped, of medium size, placed rather well apart, neither deep set nor bulging.

sentences.cn: 我听了他的话心里有点难过,只怨自己太粗心大意了.
sentences.en: I was rather saddened by what he had said and regretted my own carelessness.

sentences.cn: 查德威克小姐皱起前额,看起来有点象一只困惑的巴儿狗.
sentences.en: Miss Chadwick wrinkled up her forehead and looked rather like a perplexed Boxer dog.

sentences.cn: 她的声音有点男性化.
sentences.en: She has a rather masculine voice.

sentences.cn: 这出戏有点儿像拼凑的.
sentences.en: The play is rather bitty.

sentences.cn: 他发觉很难入睡,他对楼上的人真有点生气.
sentences.en: He found it very difficult to sleep and he was rather angry with the man upstairs.

sentences.cn: 这些说明相当复杂。
sentences.en: The instructions were rather complicated.

sentences.cn: 她跌倒了，腿伤得相当重。
sentences.en: She fell and hurt her leg rather badly.

sentences.cn: 这是个相当难的问题。
sentences.en: It was a rather difficult question.

sentences.cn: 它犯了一些相当严重的错误，我觉得应该加以纠正。
sentences.en: It had made some rather bad mistakes which I thought should be corrected...

sentences.cn: 只要你没有作弊去参照地图，就会发现一件令人相当惊讶的事——这两张列表列出的州的数量大致相同，但州的名字并不完全相同。
sentences.en: Provided you have not cheated by consulting an atlas, you will notice something rather surprising—  the two lists will contain roughly the same number of states, but they will not be identical.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.en: What do you like to do in your spare time?

sentences.cn: 他相当害怕失败.
sentences.en: He was rather apprehensive of failure.

sentences.cn: 最终形成了一个相当暧昧的宣言.
sentences.en: It was rather a vague statement that they finally made.

sentences.cn: 考虑到你在其中的贡献, 这个份额实际上看起来还是相当的慷慨.
sentences.en: Considering little effort there was put forth on your part, that actually seems rather generous.

sentences.cn: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的看法.
sentences.en: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.

sentences.cn: 但仍然有源于相当不同事分歧的其它领土.
sentences.en: But there is still another realm of disagreement which stems from something rather different.

sentences.cn: 我得说我相当悲观.
sentences.en: I have to say I am rather pessimistic.

sentences.cn: 后来出现了有相当的书面材料很多她的讲台.
sentences.en: It later emerged there was rather a lot of written material on her lectern.

sentences.cn: 这个相当重, 你能助我一臂之力 吗 ?
sentences.en: This is rather heavy. Can you give me a hand?

sentences.cn: 我觉得相当不舒服.
sentences.en: I feel rather unwell.

sentences.cn: 我习惯于吃饭时喝酒, 因此我对这顿午饭相当不满意.
sentences.en: I'm used to wine with my meals, so I find these lunches rather unsatisfactory.

sentences.cn: 公司处境相当尴尬.
sentences.en: The corporation is rather awkwardly situated.

sentences.cn: 这本书可能有用, 只是相当贵.
sentences.en: The book is likely to be useful, only it's rather expensive.

sentences.cn: 磁悬浮列车的车头是相当值得注意的.
sentences.en: The engine for maglev trains is rather in noticeable.

sentences.cn: Janet是很可爱也很聪明, 但仍然相当年轻.
sentences.en: Janet is cute and smart, but still rather young.

sentences.cn: 传说爱因斯坦小时候学得相当慢.
sentences.en: Einstein was said to is a rather slow learner in his boyhood.

sentences.cn: 我得承认我相当讨厌喝酒.
sentences.en: I have to admit I rather dislike drinking.

sentences.cn: 经济学能够对经济现象作出相当精确的预测.
sentences.en: Economics can make rather remarkably accurate predictions about economic phenomena.

sentences.cn: 统计学是数学一个相当现代的分支.
sentences.en: Statistics is a rather modern branch of mathematics.

sentences.cn: 具有延迟光学反馈的激光系统会表现出相当复杂的动力学行为.
sentences.en: Laser system with delayed optical feedback appears rather complex dynamics behavior.

sentences.cn: 地毯已磨得相当破旧了.
sentences.en: The carpets had worn rather threadbare.

sentences.cn: 这锁相当难打开, 要加点油了.
sentences.en: The lock's rather stubborn, it needs oiling.

sentences.cn: 他的身体有时不错,有时却相当虚弱.
sentences.en: His health varies from good to rather weak.

sentences.cn: 他待人态度相当严厉, 但心地确实十分善良.
sentences.en: Underneath his rather severe manner, he is really very kindhearted.

sentences.cn: 她宁愿死也不愿意演讲。
sentences.en: She'd rather die than give a speech.

sentences.cn: 如果对你来说没什么差别，我宁愿在家中工作。
sentences.en: If it's all the same to you, I'd rather work at home...

sentences.cn: 一个男生说：“我宁愿专注于在艺术上付出努力，也不想干什么拯救地球之类的事。”
sentences.en: One boy said, “I’d rather be concentrating on artistic efforts than saving the world or something.”

sentences.cn: 坦率的说, 我宁愿你没有卷入这个案子里.
sentences.en: To be frank, I'd rather you were not involved in the case.

sentences.cn: 有谁能够离开太阳宁愿选择黑暗 吗 ?
sentences.en: Who can leave the sun to aux would rather choose night?

sentences.cn: 谢谢, 杰克. 坦白地说我倒宁愿忘记自己的生日.
sentences.en: A: Thank you, Jack. To be frank, I'd rather forget my birthday.

sentences.cn: 如果你不介意的话,我宁愿今晚出去.
sentences.en: I would rather go out tonight, if you don't mind.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿坐最慢的火车,也不乘飞机去那里.
sentences.en: Rather than go there by air, I'd take slowest train.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿把时间花在自己业余爱好上.
sentences.en: He would rather keep time for his hobbies.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿花钱买台电脑而不去旅游的.
sentences.en: I would prefer buy computer rather than go on a trip.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿去散步而不想坐在这儿看他们踢足球.
sentences.en: I'd prefer to go for a walk rather than sit here watching them play football.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿吃牛肉也不愿吃羊肉.
sentences.en: I prefer beef rather than mutton.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿去迪斯科舞厅,也不愿打着父亲的名号炫耀.
sentences.en: He'd rather get into a disco than say he was Julio Iglesias's son.

sentences.cn: 像涐妹妹说旳,涐宁愿他跟涐仇人在一起.

sentences.cn: 宁愿闭口不说话, 也不要急于表现自己.
sentences.en: Rather shut up don't talk, don't be eager to expressing oneself, either.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿读书而不愿闲坐着.
sentences.en: I prefer to read rather than sit idle.

sentences.cn: 我真的宁愿自己面对的是四十多双眼睛,而不是坐到这太过光洁明亮的桌边,面对你.
sentences.en: I'd rather face forty pairs of eyes than face you, sitting at the bright shinning table.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿被嘲笑,也不愿和他吵架.
sentences.en: I would rather be laughed at than quarrel with him.

sentences.cn: 他宁愿把时间花在自己的爱好上.
sentences.en: He would much rather keep time for his hobbies.

sentences.cn: 她有钱宁愿花掉,也不肯积蓄.
sentences.en: She would rather spend than save.

sentences.cn: 我们宁愿要几个小的绝对误差,而不要一个很大的误差.
sentences.en: We would rather have several small absolute errors than one large one.

sentences.cn: 下一生, 我宁愿只当一只小鸟在天上飞来飞去,至少未试过.
sentences.en: So for next life, I'd rather a little bird, flying around in the sky.

sentences.cn: 译文:我宁愿你对于我秘密的告诉你的事情不要说什么.
sentences.en: I'd rather you didn't say anything about what I had told you in secret.

sentences.cn: 如果你是天空, 那么我宁愿是你的云!
sentences.en: If you are sky, then I would rather be your cloud!

sentences.cn: 我宁愿躺到床上去好好休息休息.
sentences.en: I'd rather lie in bed and have a good rest.

sentences.cn: 你是厌倦了金钱, 抛弃它而宁愿扫大街 麽 ?
sentences.en: You are sick of money, and you'd rather be a street cleaner?

sentences.cn: 我宁愿呆在家里也不去散步.
sentences.en: I prefer to stay at home rather than go out a walk.

sentences.cn: 他说宁愿做这个,不愿做那个.
sentences.en: He preferred to do this rather than that.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿要桌上的玫瑰也不要脖上的钻石.
